books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: When bodies are found at a Hamptons estate where a series of grisly murders once occurred, a local detective and former New York City cop investigates.
books.name: THE MURDER HOUSE

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: In a sequel to “Me Before You,” Louisa Clark tries to put her life back together after the death of Will Traynor, and joins a grief support group that may lead her to new love.
books.name: AFTER YOU

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher pries open a missing-persons case that takes him across the country and into the shadowy reaches of the Internet.
books.name: MAKE ME

books.author: by David Lagercrantz
books.description: Mikael Blomkvist and Lisbeth Salander are back in this continuation of Steig Larsson's Millennium series.
books.name: THE GIRL IN THE SPIDER'S WEB

books.author: by Jim Butcher
books.description: In the first book of a steampunk fantasy series by the author of the Dresden Files novels, people live in spires that stretch into the sky and make use of airships.
books.name: THE AERONAUT'S WINDLASS

books.author: by Karin Slaughter
books.description: When her husband is murdered, a wealthy Atlanta woman discovers shocking secrets about him that lead her to reconnect with her estranged sister; together they investigate the long-ago disappearance of a third sister.
books.name: PRETTY GIRLS

books.author: by Sherryl Woods
books.description: A woman at a crossroad returns home, where an alluring stranger raising his nephew sets her on a new course.
books.name: WILLOW BROOK ROAD

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by J. D. Robb and others
books.description: Five tales, including an Eve Dallas novella, inspired by "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland."
books.name: DOWN THE RABBIT HOLE

books.author: by Lynsay Sands
books.description: When Bricker turns Holly into a vampire to save her life, she is forced to choose between two worlds.
books.name: ABOUT A VAMPIRE

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: A forensic sculptor becomes overly invested in her latest assignment, flushing a killer along the way.
books.name: SHADOW PLAY

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II; the winner of the 2015 Pulitzer Prize.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and litigates against the coal-mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Heather Graham
books.description: Copycat murders, committed 150 years apart, reunite a historian and her F.B.I. agent husband.
books.name: THE HIDDEN
